summary: The RMS Titanic was a huge British ship that sank in 1912 after hitting an iceberg. It was on its first trip from England to New York. About 1,500 of the 2,200 people on board died, making it one of the worst ship disasters in history. The ship was very luxurious, with a gym, pool, and fancy restaurants. It also had advanced safety features but not enough lifeboats. This tragedy led to new rules to keep people safer at sea.
title: Titanic
